hang about.translation[0].definitions[0]: to move slowly or take too long doing something
Come on, we haven’t got time to hang about!
hang about.translation[0].definitions[1]: to spend time somewhere without any real purpose
There were always groups of boys hanging about in the square.
He normally hung about the house all day.
hang about.translation[0].definitions[2]: used to ask someone to wait or stop what they are doing
hang about.translation[0].definitions[3]: used when you have just noticed or thought of something that is interesting or wrong
Hang about – that can’t be right.
